# isOn

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the switch is in the on or off position.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isOn: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property allows you to retrieve and set (without animation) a value determining whether the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISwitch] object is on or off.

## Setting the on/off state

- **setOn(_:animated:)**: Sets the state of the switch to the on or off position, optionally animating the transition.
